subject_terms_3: Photography Surrender of Japan, 1945 Wars Mountbatten, Louis, Lord City Hall (Singapore)
physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features military personnel on the balcony, steps, and outside of a building that has colonnades. Everyone in the photograph is standing. There are two rows of military personnel standing at attention and facing the steps of the building. A military personnel dressed in white is standing on the steps with a podium that is covered with the flag of the Union Jack. He seems to be the centre of attention as military personnel from the ground, the steps, and the balcony are all facing in his direction.
title_text: Admiral Mountbatten reading the order of the day after the Japanese surrender Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: world wars military personnel admirals city halls
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography World War, 1939 - 1945 Mountbatten of Burma, Louis Mountbatten, Earl, 1900 - 1979 Great Britain, Army City halls
